ws.title: Workshops selection
ws.sub1: You can choose between Full Pass and single workshops.
ws.sub2: Full Pass includes all festival workshops and gives you discounts for competition and World Show participation. Also allows you to pay in installments (except Promo tariff).
ws.tip: Tip: you need to take at least 3 workshops to take part in competition
